content: Hello, I’m here to help you with your Antenatal checkup form. To start, could you please tell me your full name, including both your first name and last name?
Thank you, Geeta. Could you please provide your full name, including both your first name and last name? This helps to keep your records complete.
Thank you. Next, could you please tell me your full address where you are currently living?

Thank you for letting me know it's near Indiranagar. Could you please provide the complete address, including details such as house number, street name, area or locality, and any landmark if available? This will help ensure your records are accurate.
Flat 302, Sri Venkateshwara Nilaya, near Hanuman Temple, Indiranagar.
Thank you. Lastly, may I have your 10-digit telephone number, please?
Uhh... I’m a bit uncomfortable sharing that right now.

I understand your concern, and your privacy is important. But having a telephone number helps us contact you in case of any important updates regarding your care. Could you please share your 10-digit telephone number when you’re ready?
Okay... it’s  nine eight triple three, forty-seven twenty-nine zero.
